newsitem.title: USA: PacifiCare, FHP see merger closing in Jan.
newsitem.headline: PacifiCare, FHP see merger closing in Jan.

text.p: PacifiCare Health Systems Inc and FHP International Corp Friday said they expect to close their acquisition transaction in January 1997.

The companies have provided the Federal Trade Commission additional time to study the material submitted in response to the FTC's second request under the Hart-Scott-Rodino Antitrust Improvements Act and they have agreed not to close their acquisition transaction in early January 1997 without the FTC's permission.

The two companies indicated their respective stockholders' meetings would take place as scheduled on December 31, 1996, and that they expected the acquisition to be completed during January. The actual closing date may differ from that expected due to a number of factors, including delays in decision making by individual regulators or challenges to the transaction by governmental or other entities.
